title: Southampton
summary: Southampton (/saʊθˈ(h)æmptən/ (listen)) is a port city in the ceremonial county of Hampshire on the south coast of England.  It is located on the southern coast of Great Britain, approximately 70 miles (110 km) south-west of London and 15 miles (24 km) west of Portsmouth.[6][7] The city forms part of the South Hampshire built-up area, which also covers Portsmouth and the towns of Havant, Waterlooville, Eastleigh, Fareham, and Gosport.
